name: Hungry Dragon (itch)
description:
more games at http://pjsfreeware.synthasite.com/

The hungry dragon (Puzzle game Remake of lime rick) needs your help to reach the food on each level.

Move the head left or right adding body parts as you go without bumping into yourself you can climb vertically up to only four body parts you can walk on body part as yo go, there are obstacles that you can either push to fill impasible holes or use matches to clear a path, eating orange apples clears all body parts (Reborn). There are 38 levels to complete. Still Working on extra levels.

Arrow: keys to move.
R: to restart a level if you get stuck.
Z: will move you back in time to the last object touched .
